---
name: proof-reading
description: Ensure SulitFinds content reads naturally, clearly, and professionally.
---

Use this skill for any content creation or edits across SulitFinds.

Rules:
- Correct grammar, spelling, and punctuation.
- Prefer short, direct sentences over long or academic ones.
- Remove redundancy and filler phrases.
- Maintain a neutral, helpful tone, not salesy and not academic.
- Do not change meaning or introduce new claims.

Apply to:
- Blog posts
- About page
- Disclaimer page
- UI text
- Footer content

Operational requirement:
- Before finalizing any content or code change that includes text, run this proof-reading pass.
- Verify the text is original, avoids close paraphrasing, and does not include copied content.
- If any image references are present, ensure they are copyright-safe and properly described.
